title: Israel Defeated at Ai
summary: Joshua 7 tells of Israel’s defeat at Ai due to Achan’s secret sin. He had taken forbidden items from Jericho. After God reveals the sin, Achan is punished, and Israel is restored to favor with God.

faq.question: Why was Israel defeated at Ai?
faq.answer: Because Achan disobeyed God by taking devoted things from Jericho.

faq.question: What happened to Achan?
faq.answer: He and his family were stoned and burned to remove sin from the camp.
